item.description:
The Research Group will have their monthly Meeting from 4 to 6 pm.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/new/

Unless something comes up, I might attend.
I might need to leave before the meeting is over.

If you want to help out, then please bring a snack or soda bottle or something.

I will be leaving after the meeting.
I am not staying for their work shop.

There will be an EVP - Electronic Voice Phenomena Work Shop

from 6pm-8pm, following their meeting at the Research Center.

Class is $10.00 per person ($8.00 for members)
Pre-Registration is required as seating is limited to 15 people.

Email us or call (203)247-0310 for registration information...

With the Research Group, times and events change so please
look at their link often.

Research Group Events often changes information before I have
a chance to change things in this Meet Up site.

They are having many events in the June and July.
Please go to their site to see when these events are happening.
Many of their events are not UZ Meet Up Events
So they will not be on our calendar.
So check out their calendar to see if there is anything that
may interest you.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/events/calendar.php#

Some times they will have members only event not open to the public.
UZ has some Research Members who can attend these events.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my purple back pack at the event.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Research Group has their June Meeting on 6/27
